task.title: Add a Comment for a Variable

step.cmd: Depending on the status of an activity, select Perform or In Progress for the activity associated with the variable.
step.stepresult: The page for entering data for the modifiable variables appears.

step.cmd: Select , and then select Add Comment for a variable to add a comment.
step.stepresult: A window for entering comments for the selected variable appears.If comments already exist for a variable, select , and then select Add/Edit Comment to access the window for entering comments.

step.cmd: In the ADD NEW COMMENT box, enter a comment for the variable.

step.stepresult: An informational message stating that the comment was successfully added appears in the page for entering data for the modifiable variables.

result.p: The most recently added comment appears last in the comments list in the window for entering comments. The information about the user who added the comment and time stamp when the comment was added also appears for the comment.
result.note: If you are in the ADD NEW COMMENT box, then select Show Comments to access all existing comments entered for the variable.
